p.font: This setup is for bakery shop companies selling to consumers. Bakery are businesses that carry a large selection of products: puffs , cakes , pastries etc...

template.p: They use the Point of Sale application, Inventory, Sales, Purchase, Accounting, Contact, Employee, But if they want to grow their business with a website then a Website and E-commerce applications can be helpful in that industry.
